DataElement.preferredName: Patient Receive Drug Substance CYP3A4 Or CYP450 Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Adjustment Best Practice Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator as to whether medications been reviewed and adjusted for interactions according to local institutional practice if the patient is receiving any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity that are inhibitors or inducers of the CYP3A4 or CYP450 system as outlined in the clinical trial protocol in order to determine study eligibility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Receive Pharmacologic Substance CYP3A4 Gene Or Cytochrome P450 Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Adjustment Best Practice Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment._To take, accept, or get something offered._Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity._This gene plays an role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses._A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules._The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses._The act of bringing about something._Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality._An established corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research._Alteration of the disposition and/or effect of a drug, owing to the presence of another factor._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition._The act of making necessary corrections or modifications._An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Receive Pharmacologic Substance CYP3A4 Gene Or Cytochrome P450 Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Adjustment Best Practice Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.:This gene plays an role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs. It is also involved in the oxidation of both endogenous substrates and xenobiotics.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules. When the catalytic heme is reduced the absorbance peak for this protein occurs at 450 nm.:The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of bringing about something.:Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:Alteration of the disposition and/or effect of a drug, owing to the presence of another factor such as a second drug, or food.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.

Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.
This gene plays an role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs. It is also involved in the oxidation of both endogenous substrates and xenobiotics.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

A family of cytochromes that are involved in electron transport and oxidative metabolism of drugs and other bioactive molecules. When the catalytic heme is reduced the absorbance peak for this protein occurs at 450 nm.
The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The act of bringing about something.
Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.
Alteration of the disposition and/or effect of a drug, owing to the presence of another factor such as a second drug, or food.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The act of making necessary corrections or modifications.
An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/1/18 TMT released. 10-2-18 tmt/10200. Concept definitions were shortened to accommodate max length of database.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient is receiving any m
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving any medications or substances that are inhibitors or inducers of the CYP3A4 or CYP450 system, have their medications been reviewed and adjusted for interactions as appropriate for local institutional practice?
